description: Lists the VOD sources contained in a source location. A source represents a piece of content.

parameters.name: SourceLocationName
parameters.description: The name of the source location associated with this VOD Source list.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the VOD source.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp that indicates when the VOD source was created.

nested_items.name: HttpPackageConfigurations
nested_items.description: The HTTP package configurations for the VOD source.

nested_items.name: Path
nested_items.description: The relative path to the URL for this VOD source. This is combined with SourceLocation::HttpConfiguration::BaseUrl to form a valid URL.

nested_items.name: SourceGroup
nested_items.description: The name of the source group. This has to match one of the Channel::Outputs::SourceGroup.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The streaming protocol for this package configuration. Supported values are HLS and DASH.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp that indicates when the VOD source was last modified.

nested_items.name: SourceLocationName
nested_items.description: The name of the source location that the VOD source is associated with.

nested_items.name: VodSourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the VOD source.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Pagination token returned by the list request when results exceed the maximum allowed. Use the token to fetch the next page of results.
